mapper.select: SELECT R.RECIPE_NO AS recipeNo, R.CATEGORY_CODE AS categoryCode FROM RC_RECIPE R INNER JOIN RC_LIKE L ON R.RECIPE_NO = L.RECIPE_NO WHERE L.LIKE_YN = 'Y' AND L.CREATE_DATETIME BETWEEN #{startDateTime} AND #{endDateTime} AND R.STATUS_CODE = #{statusCode} GROUP BY R.RECIPE_NO, R.CATEGORY_CODE HAVING COUNT(L.RECIPE_NO) > 0 ORDER BY COUNT(L.RECIPE_NO) DESC LIMIT 10
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO RC_WEEKLY ( RECOMMENDED_DATE, RECIPE_NO, RECOMMENDED_TYPE_CODE, SORT_SEQUENCE, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_USER, EDIT_DATETIME, EDIT_USER ) VALUES
( #{recommendDate}, #{item.recipeNo}, #{item.recommendedTypeCode}, #{item.sortSequence}, NOW(), 0, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT C.CODE AS categoryCode FROM CM_DETAIL_CODE C LEFT JOIN RC_RECIPE R ON R.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CODE LEFT JOIN RC_WEEKLY W ON W.RECIPE_NO = R.RECIPE_NO WHERE C.GROUP_CODE = #{categoryGroupCode} AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY C.CODE ORDER BY COUNT(W.RECIPE_NO)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RC_WEEKLY WHERE RECOMMENDED_DATE < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 4 WEEK)
